authors.author: John J. Husband William P. MacKay

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Hallelujah! Thine the glory! newline Hallelujah! Amen! newline Hallelujah! Thine the glory! newline Revive us again.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: We praise Thee, O God, newline For the Son of Thy love; newline For Jesus, who died newline And is now gone above.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: We praise Thee, O God, newline For Thy Spirit of light, newline Who has shown us our Savior newline And scattered our night.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: All glory and praise newline To the Lamb that was slain, newline Who has borne all our sins newline And hath cleansed every stain.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Revive us again; newline Fill each heart with Thy love; newline May each soul be rekindled newline With fire from above.
